text: Answer: 4 Solution: P1: P2: P3 P4: P5: P6: P7: body wait (S1); wait(s1); | wait (S2); | wait(S2); | wait(S2); | wait(S4); Signal (S1); | body body wait (S3) ; | wait(S3); | wait(S3); | wait(S1); Signal (S1); | Signal (S2); | signal(S3); | body body body body Signal (S2); | signal(S3); | signal(S4); | signal(S1) Signal (S2); | signal(S3); So, to synchronize the above processes 4 semaphores are required Correct answer is 4
